decision_conditions: The proposed single storey side/rear extension by reason of excessive height and depth along the common boundary with the neighbouring property No. 7 Montague Road would result in an unneighbourly overbearing form of development harming their amenities in terms of sense of enclosure, outlook and visual impacts . Therefore, would fail to comply to policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan 2021, Policies 1.1 (e) (i) and 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), Policy 5.10 Ealing Local Variation, and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey rear/side wraparound extension; rear roof extension incorporating Juliet balcony; rear outrigger roof extension; installation of two rooflights to front roof slope; installation of window and door to side elevation; removal of two side chimneys
